title: Manasukkul Oru Puyal Lyrics Star
stanzas:
Manasukkul oru puyal
maiyam kondathe
athan peyarthaan enna

puyalukku kadhal endru
peyar solgindraar
adutha nilaithaan enna

indha puyal indru
karai kadanthaal
innum ennenna aagum
ennenna aagum

Manasukkul oru puyal
maiyam kondathe
athan peyarthaan enna

indha puyal indru
karai kadanthaal
innum ennenna aagum
ennenna aagum

Moochu vidavum
marandhuvitten
enakendru peyar illai
anbae en udal illai
engae en uyir illai
uyire

enna pudhumai
thookkam en idakkannil
kanaa en valakannil
nijamaa

moongilukkul udaikindra
kaatru mukthi petru
thirumbuthal pole
un madiyil sollaai
vilundhavan kaviyaai
mulaithaen
un ponmadi vazhga

Manasukkul oru puyal
maiyam kondathe
athan peyarthaan enna

indha puyal indru
karai kadanthaal
innum ennenna aagum
ennenna aagum

Maerkil pona paravai ondru
Maerkil pona paravai ondru
May mathathil enakoru
kanni pen varum endru
kadhil panpaadi vittu sendradhu

enna viyappu andha paadal
pan thaeyum munne
kanne en kangal
unnai kandadhu

un marbin mayyathil
enakoru kudisai poatu
naan vazhndhida vendum

seo.title: Manasukkul Oru Puyal Lyrics Star
seo.description: Get the complete Manasukkul Oru Puyal Lyrics Star from Star. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Sadhana Sargam. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Star, AR Rahman, Sadhana Sargam, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
